name: Saturn's Rising Temperature
description:
Saturn's Rising Temperature is a short visual novel made in 1 week for VN Cup

Follow the life of Saturn, a warehouse worker living on the man-made planet of SD-1409-V2, in a universe where space travel is a fad that has long since came and went.
Recently, she's been having strange dreams about the moon that orbits this planet... But, it's probably nothing, right?

Features:
One ending,
~5k words consisting mostly of lesbian monologue,
original art and music,
incredibly light sci-fi worldbuilding,
40+ CGs of varying quality,
3 entire colors,
and a story about loneliness and what we will do to avoid it.

intended for older audiences due to some suggestive implications. does not contain any outright explicit content. note there are some themes of unreality and mental struggle.

the VN is free, but if you're feeling generous, donations thru ko-fi are appreciated!
